Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2010 03:47PM Reikidolphin wrote: Hi all...I am a bit late in joining the chemo part...I started on May 28 and am doing 4 bi-weekly rounds of a/c then the big T for 4 more rounds.  I hope it is not too late to join!  First two treatments went as expected.  The biggest issue I am having is allergies...which I thought the decadron would help?!  Have been coughing a bit this weekend, and ran a very slight temp this am, first time.  I hate being so concious of my body and ailments!  I fell almost like a hypocondriach!   I am grateful I found all of you and look forward to being on the journey together.  Where was the info on those Penguin ice caps two weeks ago, lol!  I had a head shaving party a week ago, and feel wonderful in this Oklahoma heat with no hair! Wishing all of you an easy treatment round and a big hug! Kristin
Posts.Title: May 2010 Chemo fotopet leftduetostupidmods
